title: Meghan Markle Delivers Emotional Birthday Wishes To Prince Harry, ‘Best Husband and Amazing Dad’
text:
If you love The Daily Beast’s royal coverage, then we hope you’ll enjoy The Royalist, a members-only series for Beast Inside. Become a member to get it in your inbox on Sunday.

Meghan’s emotional Instagram tribute to Harry on his birthday

While most of us are content to receive a cup of coffee in bed on the occasion of our birthday, Prince Harry’s wife, Meghan Markle, delivered her husband a carefully curated birthday note on social media Sunday morning that prompted many thousands of birthday wishes in return.
description: Meghan Markle marked Prince Harry’s 35th birthday with a moving Instagram message. Plus, the Rocksavage marriage seems solid, and Meghan launches her new charity fashion line.
